title: Become a skilled animator with this discounted bundle
content:
Become a professional animator without the time and financial investment of art school. The Complete Cartoon Animator 4 Pro Mac Bundle is a comprehensive animator learning bundle that will teach you to use one of the top animation programs in the industry. Right now, The Complete Cartoon Animator 4 Pro Mac Bundle is on sale for $49.99 (Reg. $245). 

This bundle comes with three great classes: “Cartoon Animator 4 PRO for Mac,” “12 Principles of Animation Course,” and “The 3D Motion Sampler.” These 3 courses will teach you everything from constructing dynamic action poses to 2D dancing motions. You’ll be able to access all course materials for a lifetime, so learn and practice at your own pace. These 6 hours of training are led by professionals like Mark Diaz, an expert with 10+ years of experience in the film industry and over 30 short films. 

You can get The Complete Cartoon Animator 4 Pro Mac Bundle on sale for $49.99 (Reg. $254).
